title: Plastic-eating enzyme holds promise in fighting pollution - scientists
text:
Plastic-eating enzyme holds promise in fighting pollution - scientists Monday, April 16, 2018 - 01:54 
Scientists in Britain and the United States say they have engineered a plastic-eating enzyme that could in future help in the fight against pollution. Stuart McDill reports.   
Scientists in Britain and the United States say they have engineered a plastic-eating enzyme that could in future help in the fight against pollution. Stuart McDill reports.  //reut.rs/2HDKcOV
